title: Disconnects during picks/bans.
body: The client crashes during picks/bans in draft mode. Then when I restart it I can't reconnect to the lobby and the game penalizes me. I'm now at a one hour ban because this has happened twice in a row to me. Please help, Riot.

replies.body: I am having the same problem, it happened twice today and once a few days ago.

Getting a crash or a disconnect during the Champ Select screen usually indicates a connection issue between your computer and the PvP.net servers.  It's hard to pin-point exactly what could be causing this, but make sure to complete all of the steps in our [Connection Issues Guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues#wq8).  The steps there are the most common solutions that should get this to stop happening.

Reply back if you're still getting this error!
